title: Installation issue: multitail
body:
Hej,

I tried to install multitail via spack, but it failed, maybe someone can help.

Thanks and kind regards,
Bjoern

### Spack version
<!-- Add the output to the command below -->
```console
$ spack --version
0.14.0-147-58e57a6
```
